Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class JoinDataSet< T >

A specialization of DataSet which join outputs from several DataSets.

This object joins the output a several number of given DataSets. All DataSets must have exactly the same numPatterns. The resulting patternSize is the addition of each patternSize of individuals DataSets.
